significant accuracy improvements.from sentence: BiLSTM - LAN gives significant accuracy improvements over both BiLSTM - CRF and BiLSTM- softmax ( p < 0.01 ) , which is consistent with observations on development experiments .

Our model.from sentence: Our model outperforms all the baselines on all the languages .

statistically significant.from sentence: The improvements are statistically significant for all the languages ( p < 0.01 ) , suggesting that BiLSTM - LAN is generally effective across languages .

new state - of - theart results.from sentence: Compared with these methods , BiLSTM - LAN obtains new state - of - theart results on CCGBank , matching the tri-training performance of , without training on external data .
